title: EXPLOITATION - Reactivate Transactional pooling Cyclic jobs

task_list.instruction_title:

_- SC_POL03_AM (Transactional Pooling)
- SC_POL03_PM (Transactional Pooling)

Note : These job were put in dummy within IP Task [PRE-15063](PRE-15063_119497642.html)
